entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to freezing rain in the morning then to periods of rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
